channel.title: Meeting People on Simba Tango
channel.description: Recent content in Meeting People on Simba Tango

item.title: Classes and entertainment
item.author: simbatango@gmail.com (Simba)
item.description: Why do people take classes? When I first started out in tango, I assumed people attended to classes to learn how to dance or to improve their dance, learning steps or improving technique or other skills. How na√Øve. After several years more, I have discovered that people take classes for a variety of reasons, some of which I find perfectly reasonable, others I still cannot really understand. The good reasons are:
